root.header: Viber button in a support options bar launching nothing
root.description: The support chat in the Viber web app does not open when you click on the Viber icon

steps_to_reproduce.step_2: Click on the support icon (headphones) on the right side of page

root.expected_result: The support chat in the Viber web app is opened
root.actual_result: The support chat in the Viber web app is not opened
